**Day 1**  
• **Gardens by the Bay** – Walk through Supertree Grove and Flower Dome.  
• **Marina Bay Sands SkyPark** – Panoramic city views.  
• **Hawker Center** – Try *char kway teow* at Lau Pa Sat.  
• **Transport Tip**: Take the free Skytrain from Marina Bay.  

**Day 2**  
• **Chinatown** – Visit Buddha Tooth Relic Temple and Maxwell Chambers.  
• **Clarke Quay** – Riverfront dining and night views.  
• **Local Food**: Chili crab at Jumbo Seafood (book ahead).  
• **Transport Tip**: Use MRT to reach Chinatown; walk to Clarke Quay.  

**Day 3**  
• **Sentosa Island** – Universal Studios or S.E.A. Aquarium.  
• **Nature**: Jurong Bird Park or Mandai Wildlife Reserve.  
• **Local Food**: Nasi lemak from a hawker stall at Tiong Bahru.  
• **Transport Tip**: Sentosa Express from VivoCity for island access.  

*(178 words)*
